FILE
  PsiElement(comment)('/**\n * Using grammar kit to inject methods into elements\n */')
  PsiWhiteSpace('\n')
  ExampleMethodsExampleImpl(METHODS_EXAMPLE)
    PsiElement(methods)('methods')
    PsiWhiteSpace(' ')
    PsiElement({)('{')
    PsiWhiteSpace('\n    ')
    ExampleAssignmentMethodImpl(ASSIGNMENT_METHOD)
      ExampleIdentImpl(IDENT)
        PsiElement(LIDENT)('a')
      PsiWhiteSpace(' ')
      PsiElement(=)('=')
      PsiWhiteSpace(' ')
      ExampleIdentImpl(IDENT)
        PsiElement(LIDENT)('b')
    PsiWhiteSpace('\n')
    PsiElement(})('}')
